$interpreted: Alliance Soldier: Master Toyokuni, the criminal has been locked in here. Please be careful, she is a bewitcher... Who knows what she'll try and pull.
Toyokuni: I will be fine.
Soohyeon: Toyokuni...
Soohyeon: Yonghyeon...
Yonghyeon: ...You're really Soohyeon... The one who calls me Babyface...
Soohyeon: ...I'm sorry, I...
Yonghyeon: You jerk! Why didn't you tell me earlier!?
Soohyeon: ......
Yonghyeon: Well? Say something!!
Soohyeon: ...Because... bewitchers are dangerous, and...
Soohyeon: And... I know how much you hate humans.
Yonghyeon: Ah, I... Well...
Toyokuni: Don't blame yourself. This Alliance has always been bigoted towards humans, let alone bewitchers.
Yonghyeon: Toyokuni...
Toyokuni: And you saw it during the tournament, everyone was so scared. You can't blame Soohyeon for staying quiet.
Soohyeon: Thank you for understanding, Toyokuni.
Toyokuni: Yonghyeon...?
Yonghyeon: ...I know, of course I understand... but...
Yonghyeon: But if you had told me earlier, I could have helped you... You dummy, you didn't have to take all this on alone...

Toyokuni: Enough, Yonghyeon, the past isn't important anymore. 
It's what we do going forward that matters.
Yonghyeon: You're right, none of this is important.

Yonghyeon: What's important is getting Soohyeon out of here!
You must have a way to free her... right, Toyokuni?
Soohyeon: What!?
Toyokuni: It was hard enough for the Qilin Tribe to allow us to visit Soohyeon in the first place. Now you want to free her!?
Toyokuni: The Alliance has its laws, Yonghyeon, and Soohyeon broke them. The most we can do is... try and keep Soohyeon from facing execution.
Yonghyeon: Execution...
Soohyeon: It's okay, Yonghyeon... you're doing all you can.
Soohyeon: Toyokuni, what about my mom? Is she okay?
Toyokuni: Your mother... After an emergency meeting, she went along with the chieftains' "suggestion", to avoid a panic.
Toyokuni: ...They've decided to go ahead and finish the tournament.
Toyokuni: And that means nothing happens to you until it's over.
Toyokuni: As far as how she truly feels... I haven't heard her say anything.
Toyokuni: It's possible she doesn't know what to feel right now...
Soohyeon: ...What about Pearl Manor? Have you heard anything?

Toyokuni: I haven't heard anything about that, but...
Soohyeon, you're no longer protected as a tournament contestant.
Toyokuni: Please, you should be thinking more about yourself right now, not about Pearl Manor.
Soohyeon: ...Okay...
Toyokuni: And... there's something else I think you have the right to know.
Toyokuni: Because you're no longer a tournament contestant, Tindoiimu has made it to the finals.
Yonghyeon: Hmph, she totally took advantage! That's not fair!
Soohyeon: Enough, Yonghyeon...
Yonghyeon: What, it's the truth, isn't it!?

Yonghyeon: None of this is fair! 
The Alliance, the bewitchers...
Yonghyeon: None of it...!
Soohyeon: Yonghyeon... I made a choice, okay?
Pang: ...Are you okay?
Tindoiimu: Why are you asking me that all of a sudden?
Pang: You just... don't look so good.
Tindoiimu: It's got nothing to do with you.
Pang: ...I'm sorry such a thing had to happen during your match. I'm sure it would have gone well, otherwise.
Tindoiimu: Gone well...? Soohyeon? Do you even know her at all?
Tindoiimu: Do you really think she's as innocent as she makes herself seem?
Pang: No... it is true, I do not know Soohyeon very well.
Pang: And yet, for her to come clean at that moment... was no small feat of courage.
Tindoiimu: She's not the only courageous one around here!
Tindoiimu: And no one forced her to say anything, it was her own decision!
Pang: Are you alright? This isn't like you...
Pang: It seems like you're trying to... suppress something.
Tindoiimu: Don't overthink it.
Pang: I'm sorry, maybe I'm overstepping my bounds. It is just... I have dealt with similar emotions in the past, so I think I can understand...
Tindoiimu: Pfft. Have you forgotten we're supposed to be competing against each other?
Pang: That is exactly why I wish you the best.
Alliance Soldier: You both may enter the arena.
Pang: Very well.
Chiyuki: Welcome, everyone, to the Martial Arts Tournament finals!
Puggi: Eh? Aren't these the finals? Why's everyone so quiet?
Jia-Shen: Ahem, maybe read the room, Puggi?

Disappointed Person: Oh man, I can't believe Miss Soohyeon was a bewitcher...
Without her here, what's the point?
Chiyuki: (Yes, it's a shame what happened to Soohyeon, but... I'm Hanazono Chiyuki! It's my job to raise everyone's spirits!)
Chiyuki: I am aware this is quite the somber moment. It is truly awful what transpired...
Chiyuki: And yet, they say every cloud has a silver lining! And I would say, having our tournament finals today is a blessing from the Holy Dragon himself!
Disappointed Person: A blessing from the Holy Dragon?
Chiyuki: Yes! I'm referring to the formation of our great Alliance, of course!
Chiyuki: Remember, hundreds of years ago there was an evil dragon.
Chiyuki: A dragon of harsh, blazing flames and gnashing teeth, it brought misfortune and disaster upon the people! That is, until the Holy Dragon appeared─
Chiyuki: They underwent countless battles, but finally, with the help of the citizens of this very land, the Holy Dragon defeated the evil dragon!
Chiyuki: Unfortunately, the Holy Dragon also used up all of his own power. He sank into the earth, becoming celestial energy and birthing the Mythics!
Chiyuki: And, as we all know, the Mythics started out at war with one another, which angered the great dragon.
Chiyuki: And it was at this juncture that the Mythics put aside their differences and came together, creating this very alliance.
Hestia: Wow, to think our homeland went through such a tumultuous beginning...
Chiyuki: And now, our arbiter, the arbiter chosen by the Holy Dragon's will, must lead us through these difficult times.
Excited Audience: That's right... the Holy Dragon knows best!
Faithful Audience: You're right, let's continue the tournament! The Holy Dragon won't lead us astray!
Chiyuki: Now, let's not be hasty! As is tradition, the finals are a bit different from previous events.
Chiyuki: Our two finalists have shown their strength in past battles, no doubt, and yet the arbiter must not only be strong... they must also be just!
Pang: Just...
Chiyuki: Yes, no matter the trials and tribulations, the Alliance arbiter must uphold the principles of morality and justice at all times!
Tindoiimu: So we're not fighting? How are we supposed to battle using our 'morals'?
???: Through, Trial of, Dream Flower...
Maeok: Ah, chieftain of the Tapir Tribe, I haven't seen you in twenty years, and yet you haven't aged a day!

Tapir Chieftain: Aha! This door, twenty years, never opened.
And yet, twenty years, Alliance, much has changed...
Tapir Chieftain: As have you, Arbiter Maeok.
Maeok: Yes... with all the changes a day brings, twenty years brings even more.
Maeok: ...And I'm old now, it seems...
Maeok: Anyhow, these two are our new tournament finalists.
Tapir Chieftain: Welcome, you two.

Chiyuki: Everyone, this here is our own Keeper of the Dream Flower~ 
The ever-elusive, Tapir Chieftain!
Tindoiimu: Keeper of the Dream Flower...?
Tapir Chieftain: Many years ago, the Holy Dragon, lost wings, birthed the Udumbara... Left behind, keeper of the Udumbara, witnessed the birth of Alliance...
Tapir Chieftain: Passed on will of Alliance... Carved holy talismans, made Dream Flower, selected each arbiter...
Tapir Chieftain: Old tribe, no change, forever keeper.
Tindoiimu: So, you mean we do this 'Trial of the Dream Flower', and then this keeper of the Udumbara chooses who the next arbiter is...?
Tapir Chieftain: Yes. Keeper of the Udumbara, pass down Holy Dragon's will. Udumbara flower, proof of will, keep protecting, East Alliance.
Tindoiimu: (Protecting the East Alliance? Yeah, right...)
Chiyuki: Now, may the Tapir Chieftain bring our two finalists to the trial!
Tapir Chieftain: Before that, I have... one wish.
Tapir Chieftain: Although I... seldom come outside. I know, a thing or two... of this world. The beauty, radiance.

Tapir Chieftain: Today, here, I see... such radiance.
If I may, ask something of, such an elegant maiden... this trip, not in vain.
Chiyuki: Elegant maiden... me? Oh, chieftain, you are too kind!
Chiyuki: (I know what comes next... I've said it before...)
Chiyuki: (But no, this time will be different!)
Chiyuki: Yes, of course we can be friends!
Tapir Chieftain: Friends... Oh, no...
Tapir Chieftain: May I have... your autograph?
Chiyuki: A-Autograph? Um, sure. Does anyone have a piece of paper?
Tapir Chieftain: Thank you, very much. I will, treasure this... forever.
Chiyuki: (I guess she didn't want to be friends after all... Same as always.)
Chiyuki: Yah, it's him...!
Tapir Chieftain: Hmm? Who?
Chiyuki: Um, nothing! I-I'm very excited for the Trials of the Dream Flower!
Tapir Chieftain: Aha... Yes, I shall, lead the way...
Chiyuki: (Finally... but what is my savior doing here!?)
Tapir Chieftain: Please, follow me...
Yao: Wait!
Yao: He... has no right to be in this tournament!
Pang: Yao!?

Model.Text: Master Toyokuni, the criminal has been locked in here. Please be careful, she is a bewitcher... Who knows what she'll try and pull.
I will be fine.
Toyokuni...
Yonghyeon...
...You're really Soohyeon... The one who calls me Babyface...
...I'm sorry, I...
You jerk! Why didn't you tell me earlier!?
Well? Say something!!
...Because... bewitchers are dangerous, and...
And... I know how much you hate humans.
Ah, I... Well...
Don't blame yourself. This Alliance has always been bigoted towards humans, let alone bewitchers.
Toyokuni...
And you saw it during the tournament, everyone was so scared. You can't blame Soohyeon for staying quiet.
Thank you for understanding, Toyokuni.
Yonghyeon...?
...I know, of course I understand... but...
But if you had told me earlier, I could have helped you... You dummy, you didn't have to take all this on alone...

Enough, Yonghyeon, the past isn't important anymore. 
It's what we do going forward that matters.
You're right, none of this is important.

What's important is getting Soohyeon out of here!
You must have a way to free her... right, Toyokuni?
What!?
It was hard enough for the Qilin Tribe to allow us to visit Soohyeon in the first place. Now you want to free her!?
The Alliance has its laws, Yonghyeon, and Soohyeon broke them. The most we can do is... try and keep Soohyeon from facing execution.
Execution...
It's okay, Yonghyeon... you're doing all you can.
Toyokuni, what about my mom? Is she okay?
Your mother... After an emergency meeting, she went along with the chieftains' "suggestion", to avoid a panic.
...They've decided to go ahead and finish the tournament.
And that means nothing happens to you until it's over.
As far as how she truly feels... I haven't heard her say anything.
It's possible she doesn't know what to feel right now...
...What about Pearl Manor? Have you heard anything?

I haven't heard anything about that, but...
Soohyeon, you're no longer protected as a tournament contestant.
Please, you should be thinking more about yourself right now, not about Pearl Manor.
...Okay...
And... there's something else I think you have the right to know.
Because you're no longer a tournament contestant, Tindoiimu has made it to the finals.
Hmph, she totally took advantage! That's not fair!
Enough, Yonghyeon...
What, it's the truth, isn't it!?

None of this is fair! 
The Alliance, the bewitchers...
None of it...!
Yonghyeon... I made a choice, okay?
...Are you okay?
Why are you asking me that all of a sudden?
You just... don't look so good.
It's got nothing to do with you.
...I'm sorry such a thing had to happen during your match. I'm sure it would have gone well, otherwise.
Gone well...? Soohyeon? Do you even know her at all?
Do you really think she's as innocent as she makes herself seem?
No... it is true, I do not know Soohyeon very well.
And yet, for her to come clean at that moment... was no small feat of courage.
She's not the only courageous one around here!
And no one forced her to say anything, it was her own decision!
Are you alright? This isn't like you...
It seems like you're trying to... suppress something.
Don't overthink it.
I'm sorry, maybe I'm overstepping my bounds. It is just... I have dealt with similar emotions in the past, so I think I can understand...
Pfft. Have you forgotten we're supposed to be competing against each other?
That is exactly why I wish you the best.
You both may enter the arena.
Very well.
Welcome, everyone, to the Martial Arts Tournament finals!
Eh? Aren't these the finals? Why's everyone so quiet?
Ahem, maybe read the room, Puggi?

Oh man, I can't believe Miss Soohyeon was a bewitcher...
Without her here, what's the point?
(Yes, it's a shame what happened to Soohyeon, but... I'm Hanazono Chiyuki! It's my job to raise everyone's spirits!)
I am aware this is quite the somber moment. It is truly awful what transpired...
And yet, they say every cloud has a silver lining! And I would say, having our tournament finals today is a blessing from the Holy Dragon himself!
A blessing from the Holy Dragon?
Yes! I'm referring to the formation of our great Alliance, of course!
Remember, hundreds of years ago there was an evil dragon.
A dragon of harsh, blazing flames and gnashing teeth, it brought misfortune and disaster upon the people! That is, until the Holy Dragon appeared─
They underwent countless battles, but finally, with the help of the citizens of this very land, the Holy Dragon defeated the evil dragon!
Unfortunately, the Holy Dragon also used up all of his own power. He sank into the earth, becoming celestial energy and birthing the Mythics!
And, as we all know, the Mythics started out at war with one another, which angered the great dragon.
And it was at this juncture that the Mythics put aside their differences and came together, creating this very alliance.
Wow, to think our homeland went through such a tumultuous beginning...
And now, our arbiter, the arbiter chosen by the Holy Dragon's will, must lead us through these difficult times.
That's right... the Holy Dragon knows best!
You're right, let's continue the tournament! The Holy Dragon won't lead us astray!
Now, let's not be hasty! As is tradition, the finals are a bit different from previous events.
Our two finalists have shown their strength in past battles, no doubt, and yet the arbiter must not only be strong... they must also be just!
Just...
Yes, no matter the trials and tribulations, the Alliance arbiter must uphold the principles of morality and justice at all times!
So we're not fighting? How are we supposed to battle using our 'morals'?
Through, Trial of, Dream Flower...
Ah, chieftain of the Tapir Tribe, I haven't seen you in twenty years, and yet you haven't aged a day!

Aha! This door, twenty years, never opened.
And yet, twenty years, Alliance, much has changed...
As have you, Arbiter Maeok.
Yes... with all the changes a day brings, twenty years brings even more.
...And I'm old now, it seems...
Anyhow, these two are our new tournament finalists.
Welcome, you two.

Everyone, this here is our own Keeper of the Dream Flower~ 
The ever-elusive, Tapir Chieftain!
Keeper of the Dream Flower...?
Many years ago, the Holy Dragon, lost wings, birthed the Udumbara... Left behind, keeper of the Udumbara, witnessed the birth of Alliance...
Passed on will of Alliance... Carved holy talismans, made Dream Flower, selected each arbiter...
Old tribe, no change, forever keeper.
So, you mean we do this 'Trial of the Dream Flower', and then this keeper of the Udumbara chooses who the next arbiter is...?
Yes. Keeper of the Udumbara, pass down Holy Dragon's will. Udumbara flower, proof of will, keep protecting, East Alliance.
(Protecting the East Alliance? Yeah, right...)
Now, may the Tapir Chieftain bring our two finalists to the trial!
Before that, I have... one wish.
Although I... seldom come outside. I know, a thing or two... of this world. The beauty, radiance.

Today, here, I see... such radiance.
If I may, ask something of, such an elegant maiden... this trip, not in vain.
Elegant maiden... me? Oh, chieftain, you are too kind!
(I know what comes next... I've said it before...)
(But no, this time will be different!)
Yes, of course we can be friends!
Friends... Oh, no...
May I have... your autograph?
A-Autograph? Um, sure. Does anyone have a piece of paper?
Thank you, very much. I will, treasure this... forever.
(I guess she didn't want to be friends after all... Same as always.)
Yah, it's him...!
Hmm? Who?
Um, nothing! I-I'm very excited for the Trials of the Dream Flower!
Aha... Yes, I shall, lead the way...
(Finally... but what is my savior doing here!?)
Please, follow me...
Wait!
He... has no right to be in this tournament!
Yao!?

I haven't heard her say anything.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_13_003","SpeakerName":"Toyokuni","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3420c4","IconName":"t3420c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's possible she doesn't know what to feel right now...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...What about Pearl Manor? Have you heard anything?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Toyokuni","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3420c4","IconName":"t3420c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I haven't heard anything about that, but...
Soohyeon, you're no longer protected as a tournament contestant.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Toyokuni","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3420c4","IconName":"t3420c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, you should be thinking more about yourself right now, not about Pearl Manor.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_15_002","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Okay...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Toyokuni","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3420c4","IconName":"t3420c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And... there's something else I think you have the right to know.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Toyokuni","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3420c4","IconName":"t3420c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Because you're no longer a tournament contestant, Tindoiimu has made it to the finals.","sfxName":"human_male_middle_soldier_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph, she totally took advantage! That's not fair!","sfxName":"t0184sx_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Enough, Yonghyeon...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What, it's the truth, isn't it!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_18_003","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"None of this is fair! 
The Alliance, the bewitchers...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_18_004","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"None of it...!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_18_005","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yonghyeon... I made a choice, okay?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Are you okay?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Why are you asking me that all of a sudden?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You just... don't look so good.","sfxName":"t0017_story_013","sfxVolume":0.75},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_19_003","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's got nothing to do with you.","sfxName":"h0183sx_story_001_b","sfxVolume":0.85},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I'm sorry such a thing had to happen during your match. I'm sure it would have gone well, otherwise.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gone well...? Soohyeon? Do you even know her at all?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Do you really think she's as innocent as she makes herself seem?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No... it is true, I do not know Soohyeon very well.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And yet, for her to come clean at that moment... was no small feat of courage.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"She's not the only courageous one around here!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And no one forced her to say anything, it was her own decision!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Are you alright? This isn't like you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It seems like you're trying to... suppress something.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't overthink it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry, maybe I'm overstepping my bounds. It is just... I have dealt with similar emotions in the past, so I think I can understand...","sfxName":"t0017_story_004","sfxVolume":0.7},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Pfft. Have you forgotten we're supposed to be competing against each other?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That is exactly why I wish you the best.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Alliance Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"0_no_face","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You both may enter the arena.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Very well.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Welcome, everyone, to the Martial Arts Tournament finals!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh? Aren't these the finals? Why's everyone so quiet?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ahem, maybe read the room, Puggi?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Disappointed Person","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3449c4","IconName":"t3449c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh man, I can't believe Miss Soohyeon was a bewitcher...
Without her here, what's the point?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Yes, it's a shame what happened to Soohyeon, but... I'm Hanazono Chiyuki! It's my job to raise everyone's spirits!)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I am aware this is quite the somber moment. It is truly awful what transpired...","sfxName":"t0188sx_story_024","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And yet, they say every cloud has a silver lining! And I would say, having our tournament finals today is a blessing from the Holy Dragon himself!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Disappointed Person","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3449c4","IconName":"t3449c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A blessing from the Holy Dragon?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes! I'm referring to the formation of our great Alliance, of course!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Remember, hundreds of years ago there was an evil dragon.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A dragon of harsh, blazing flames and gnashing teeth, it brought misfortune and disaster upon the people! That is, until the Holy Dragon appeared─","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"They underwent countless battles, but finally, with the help of the citizens of this very land, the Holy Dragon defeated the evil dragon!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Unfortunately, the Holy Dragon also used up all of his own power. He sank into the earth, becoming celestial energy and birthing the Mythics!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And, as we all know, the Mythics started out at war with one another, which angered the great dragon.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And it was at this juncture that the Mythics put aside their differences and came together, creating this very alliance.","sfxName":"t0188sx_story_014","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Hestia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/e0002","IconName":"e0002s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wow, to think our homeland went through such a tumultuous beginning...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And now, our arbiter, the arbiter chosen by the Holy Dragon's will, must lead us through these difficult times.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Excited Audience","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3450c4","IconName":"t3450c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's right... the Holy Dragon knows best!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Faithful Audience","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3449c4","IconName":"t3449c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're right, let's continue the tournament! The Holy Dragon won't lead us astray!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now, let's not be hasty! As is tradition, the finals are a bit different from previous events.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Our two finalists have shown their strength in past battles, no doubt, and yet the arbiter must not only be strong... they must also be just!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_37_002","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes, no matter the trials and tribulations, the Alliance arbiter must uphold the principles of morality and justice at all times!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_37_003","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So we're not fighting? How are we supposed to battle using our 'morals'?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_37_004","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"0_no_face","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Through, Trial of, Dream Flower...","sfxName":"human_female_old_01_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, chieftain of the Tapir Tribe, I haven't seen you in twenty years, and yet you haven't aged a day!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Aha! This door, twenty years, never opened.
And yet, twenty years, Alliance, much has changed...","sfxName":"human_female_old_04","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"As have you, Arbiter Maeok.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes... with all the changes a day brings, twenty years brings even more.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...And I'm old now, it seems...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Anyhow, these two are our new tournament finalists.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Welcome, you two.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Everyone, this here is our own Keeper of the Dream Flower~ 
The ever-elusive, Tapir Chieftain!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Keeper of the Dream Flower...?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_41_002","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Many years ago, the Holy Dragon, lost wings, birthed the Udumbara... Left behind, keeper of the Udumbara, witnessed the birth of Alliance...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_41_003","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Passed on will of Alliance... Carved holy talismans, made Dream Flower, selected each arbiter...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_41_004","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Old tribe, no change, forever keeper.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, you mean we do this 'Trial of the Dream Flower', and then this keeper of the Udumbara chooses who the next arbiter is...?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_42_001","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes. Keeper of the Udumbara, pass down Holy Dragon's will. Udumbara flower, proof of will, keep protecting, East Alliance.","sfxName":"human_female_old_01_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Protecting the East Alliance? Yeah, right...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_43_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now, may the Tapir Chieftain bring our two finalists to the trial!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_43_002","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Before that, I have... one wish.","sfxName":"human_female_old_01_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Although I... seldom come outside. I know, a thing or two... of this world. The beauty, radiance.","sfxName":"human_female_old_04","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_44_001","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Today, here, I see... such radiance.
If I may, ask something of, such an elegant maiden... this trip, not in vain.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Elegant maiden... me? Oh, chieftain, you are too kind!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_46_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I know what comes next... I've said it before...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_46_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(But no, this time will be different!)","sfxName":"t0188sx_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_47_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes, of course we can be friends!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_47_001","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Friends... Oh, no...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_47_002","SpeakerName":"Tapir Chieftain","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3468c4","IconName":"t3468c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"May I have... your autograph?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_312_004_dialog_english##_48_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A-Autograph?
